revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Radxa cm3 io board.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = ROCK3 Compute Module |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://wiki.radxa.com/Rock3/CM/CM3 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Radxa |model = Rock Pi CM3 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = RM116 |revision = V1.3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = D2E16W |page_start_date = 3 December 2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Radxa_Rock_Pi_CM3_(D2E16W) |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = SoM |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2A3PA-RADXA-CM3 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3566; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A55 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-G52; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Foresee;FSE1AD9D-16G; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNBKMML-HRNME; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.2 |addchip = Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK817-5;;1;,,, 16Kb Serial EEPROM;Shanghai Belling;BL24C16A;;1;,,, 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC-DC Converter;Tctek;TCS4525;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089A;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;1;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/09/2021 |estreldate = 11/2021 |estprice = 45 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-CM256SM |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ROCK 3 Compute Module V1.3" and "20220326" are silkscreened on board top.
{{See also|Radxa|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3566 Quad-Core @2.0GHz :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A55); NPU: 0.8 TOPS *GPU: ''Mali-G52'' (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Cypress]] CYW43455 :802.11bgn+ac (1T1R), BT 4.2 *Network: 1x GbE port via connectors *Power Source: 5V via connectors
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/07/radxa-cm3-raspberry-pi-cm4-alternative/ ''Radxa CM3 – A drop-in Raspberry Pi CM4 alternative'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/radxa-cm3-is-an-rk3566-powered-drop-in-replacement-for-a-raspberry-pi-cm4/''Radxa CM3 is an RK3566-powered drop-in replacement for a Raspberry Pi CM4'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2021/pine64-and-radxas-new-pi-cm4-compatible-boards ''Pine64 and Radxa's new Pi CM4-compatible boards'' on '''Jeff Geerling''' Blog]
